thought: To craft a redstone_lamp, I need to first craft redstone. To craft redstone, I need to smelt redstone_ore. I have 4 redstone_ore in slot 38, so I will smelt one of them into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 38 to slot 11 with quantity 1
